page.title: 20Durweston School Domesday
page.content:
First we went around Durweston in groups looking at the houses. We went around Stourpaine in the same way. Four people went around farms in the area. We all took a sheet home to fill in about our homes and our families.
All the pages were written by the children in the top class of Durweston First School. We are all eight or nine years old. Zoe Holloway. Charles Goodbody. Kirsty Turner. Ricky Damen. Emma Corry. Dennis Thorne. Sharon Munday. James Henley. Katie Galpin. Lee Rayment. Brida Coombes. Kevin Robbins. Toni-Lisa Beale. Mark Burns. Melanie Ricketts. Jonathan Winder. Edward Jenke. Mr John Paulley took the photographs for us.
